pr_title: improvement/GEODE-8002 Refactor: Extract class to encapsulate concurrent execution

timeline.bodyText: Should the call of Thread.yield be optional? I'm not sure you would always want this
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: That makes sense. I want to leave it like this as the default, though, and if someone wants to change the behavior they can add that functionality.  How do you feel about that?  Or do you think not having this as an option is a dealbreaker.
replies.author: prettyClouds

replies.bodyText: not a deal breaker. I just merged in a new dunit test for concurrent testing of SADD. It would be nice to have this encapsulated concurrency code in that test before it becomes the pattern for subsequent tests
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: alright.  it's a real PR now.
replies.author: prettyClouds
